00042 enum l4re_ma_flags {
00043   L4RE_MA_CONTINUOUS  = 0x01,
00044   L4RE_MA_PINNED      = 0x02,
00045   L4RE_MA_SUPER_PAGES = 0x04,
00046 };

00066 L4_CV L4_INLINE long
00067 l4re_ma_alloc(unsigned long size, l4re_ds_t const mem,
00068               unsigned long flags) L4_NOTHROW;
00069 
00079 L4_CV L4_INLINE long
00080 l4re_ma_free(l4re_ds_t const mem) L4_NOTHROW;

00099 L4_CV long
00100 l4re_ma_alloc_srv(l4_cap_idx_t srv, unsigned long size, l4re_ds_t const mem,
00101                   unsigned long flags) L4_NOTHROW;
00102 
00113 L4_CV long
00114 l4re_ma_free_srv(l4_cap_idx_t srv, l4re_ds_t const mem) L4_NOTHROW;

00119 
00120 /***************** Implementation *****************/
00121 
00122 L4_CV L4_INLINE long
00123 l4re_ma_alloc(unsigned long size, l4re_ds_t const mem,
00124               unsigned long flags) L4_NOTHROW
00125 {
00126   return l4re_ma_alloc_srv(l4re_global_env->mem_alloc, size, mem, flags);
00127 }
00128 
00129 L4_CV L4_INLINE long
00130 l4re_ma_free(l4re_ds_t const mem) L4_NOTHROW
00131 {
00132   return l4re_ma_free_srv(l4re_global_env->mem_alloc, mem);
00133 }
00134 
00135 EXTERN_C_END
